column5: Trusted and backed by marquee global investors
Got questions? Find your answers here

column2: How can we utilise the credits offered?
Credits can be utilised in terms of Amazon Vouchers, if mentioned services are opted in through Leap.
What are the required application documents?
Application process for Germany may require following documents to be prepared and submitted by the student.
1. SOP
2. LOR
3. Resume
4. Essay
5. Visa SOP
6. Scholarship
How can Leap help in building profile?

Dedicated counsellors with 10+ years of expertise are assigned that will counsel the students in evaluating the profile, and recommend methods through which student can improve their profile to improve their chances of admissions. This is highly recommended for students who are planning for future intakes.
How cheaper are the forex charges from the market?
If payments are done through Leap, you can save upto 25% on forex transactions.
Are there any no-cost EMI options?
Yes, we have partnered with 10+ national banks to offer no-cost EMI options to you, so that paying for this package, does not become a blocker for your study abroad dreams.
What if I want to apply to more universities?
If you wish to get more shortlists and apply to more universities, Leap will charge a flat ₹10,000 fee, if the deposit to the university is done through us.
